text: He imana vali'o! Jadom' tusim namaza la'i uthom tam apane cihare ate apane hatham nu kuhani'am taka dho lavom ate apane siram da masaha (hatha gile kara ke sira ute phairanam) karo ate apane pairam nu giti'am taka dhovo. Jekara tusim' gade hom tam isanana kara lavom. Jekara tusim bimari tom pirata ho jam safara vica hom jam tuhade vicom ko'i mala mutara ti'aga ke a'i'a hove jam tusim apani patani nala sabhoga kita hove jam phira tuhanu pani na mile tam sapha miti nala tayamuma kara lavo ate apane cihare ate hatham upara usa nala masaha karom. Alaha nahim cahuda ki uha tuhanu kise musakala vica pave sago uha tam cahuda hai ki uha tuhanu pavitara kare ate tuhanu apani puri kirapa nala nivaze tam ki tusim usa de sukara guzara bano
